front.title: A YANG Data Model for Layer 0 Types

abstract.t: This document defines a collection of common data types and groupings in the YANG data modeling language. These derived common types and groupings are intended to be imported by modules that model Layer 0 Traffic Engineering (TE) configuration and state capabilities such as Wavelength Switched Optical Networks (WSONs) and Spectrum Switched optical Networks (SSONs). The applicability of this document is mainly for TE, but not limited to. The YANG data model in this document conforms to the Network Management Datastore Architecture defined in RFC8342.
